meanings.sent1: The pig was oinking loudly in the barn.
meanings.sent2: I heard the pigs oinking as I walked past the farm.
meanings.sent3: The oinking of the pig made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The oinking of the pig echoed through the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The oinking sound was so distinct, it could be recognized from afar.

meanings.definition: The characteristic snorting sound made by a pig.
meanings.sent1: The farmer recognized the oinking of his favorite pig.
meanings.sent2: The oinking of the piglets was music to the farmer's ears.
meanings.sent3: The oinking of the pig added a touch of charm to the farm.
meanings.sent4: The oinking of the pig was like a symphony in the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The oinking of the pig brought a sense of joy to the surroundings.
